results.name: a(n) = Kronecker(7/n).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Jean-Paul Allouche, Leo Goldmakher, Mock characters and the Kronecker symbol, arXiv:1608.03957 [math.NT], 2016.
formula: if n==0 (mod 7) a(n)=0; for p in=A003632 a(p)=-1; for p in A038878 a(p)=+1
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 03 2004
